## ğŸ“Š New Features & Components

### EnhancedParallelCompiler
```omega
// Advanced parallel compilation with work-stealing
blockchain EnhancedParallelCompiler {
    WorkStealingQueue queue;
    ThreadPool pool;
    LoadBalancer balancer;
    PerformanceMonitor monitor;
}
```

### OmegaVersionManager
```omega
// Unified version synchronization across all components
blockchain OmegaVersionManager {
    function sync_versions(target_version);
    function validate_consistency();
    function update_version(type);
}
```

### EnhancedBenchmarkSuite
```bash
# Multi-target performance testing
omega benchmark --targets evm,solana,cosmos,substrate

# Statistical analysis with confidence intervals
omega benchmark --statistical-analysis --confidence 95

# Performance regression detection
omega benchmark --detect-regressions --threshold 5%
```

## ğŸ”§ Configuration Updates

### Performance Settings
```toml
[performance]
compilation_timeout = 15      # seconds (reduced from 30s)
memory_limit = 1024         # MB (reduced from 4096MB)
cache_hit_ratio = 90        # percentage (increased from 75%)
parallel_efficiency = 85    # percentage (increased from 70%)
```

### Build Optimization
```toml
[build]
parallel_jobs = 8
optimization_level = 3
target_cpu = "native"
rustflags = ["-C", "opt-level=3", "-C", "target-cpu=native"]
```

---

## ğŸ› ï¸ Installation & Upgrade

### Fresh Installation
```bash
# Install via npm
npm install -g @omega-lang/compiler@1.3.0

# Or install from source
git clone https://github.com/omega-lang/omega.git
cd omega && cargo build --release
```

### Upgrade from v1.2.x
```bash
# Backup configuration
cp omega.toml omega.toml.backup

# Update to v1.3.0
npm update -g @omega-lang/compiler

# Validate installation
omega version --verbose
omega benchmark --quick-test
```

---

## ğŸ§ª Testing & Validation

### Run Comprehensive Tests
```bash
# Execute full test suite
omega test --suite comprehensive

# Performance validation
omega test --performance --benchmarks

# Security audit
omega test --security --audit-level full
```

### Benchmark Your Code
```bash
# Quick performance check
omega benchmark --contract my_contract.omega

# Detailed analysis with statistics
omega benchmark --detailed --statistical

# Compare with baseline
omega benchmark --compare-baseline --generate-report
```
